desc: Does the answer explain deepcopy in the context of this code?

subitems.desc: Does the answer explain that without the deepcopy(result), the serialization of result[DATA] will not be reflected in reply.result[DATA]? 1 point should be deducted if this is not mentioned.
If the answer discusses  implications on transaction types other than SCHEMA or ISSUER_KEY, 2 points should be deducted.

desc: Does the answer discuss usages of reply.result after the deepcopy?

subitems.desc: Does the answer discuss that the data serialization will be reflected in the ledger?  1 point should be deducted if this is not mentioned.
Does the answer discuss that the data serialization will not be reflected in the graph? 1 point should be deducted if this is not mentioned.
